mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.`name`, b.logo FROM t_attention AS a LEFT JOIN t_company AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{createBy} AND a.type = 0

SELECT b.id, b.amount, b.title, b.type, b.create_at AS createAt, b.unit_name AS unitName FROM t_attention AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND date_sub(CURDATE(), interval 1 month) < b.create_at order by b.create_at desc

SELECT a.id, b.`name`, b.unit_name AS unitName, b.professional, b.job, b.photo, b.research_direction AS harvest, b.tech_domain AS techDomain FROM t_attention AS a LEFT JOIN t_talent_pool AS b ON a.pid = b.id where a.user_id = #{createBy} and a.type = 2
SELECT a.id, b.`name`, b.logo FROM t_attention AS a LEFT JOIN t_company AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{createBy} AND a.type = 1
